TitlePage.Title: Gurobify
TitlePage.Subtitle: A &GAP; interface to Gurobi Optimizer.
TitlePage.Author:
Jesse Lansdown
Jesse Lansdown
Centre for the Mathematics of Symmetry and Computation
The University of Western Australia
35 Stirling Highway
PERTH WA 6009
Australia
jesse.lansdown@uwa.edu.au https://www.jesselansdown.com
TitlePage.Abstract: Gurobify provides an interface to the Gurobi Optimizer software from &GAP;. It enables the creation and modification of mixed integer and linear programming models which can be solved directly by Gurobi from within the &GAP; environment.

I also thank John Bamberg for introducing me to both &GAP; and Gurobi and showing me how they can be used to so effectively complement each other. I used the AutoDoc package to streamline the creation of the documentation for this package, and PackageMaker to generate a package template. I would also like to acknowledge the support of an Australian Government Research Training Program (RTP) Scholarship while writing this software.
